greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Least m such that omega(m) + Omega(m) = n, or 0 if no such m exists.
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (2).
program: (PARI) a(n) = {m = 1; while (omega(m) + bigomega(m) != n, m++); m} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Oct 23 2013
xref: First occurrence of n in A080256.
results.author: _Lekraj Beedassy_, Oct 13 2003
ext: Corrected and extended by _Ray Chandler_, Nov 01 2003
